com.netflix.blitz4j
Class LoggingConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.blitz4j.LoggingConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.netflix.config.PropertyListener
public class LoggingConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.netflix.config.PropertyListener

The main configuration class that bootstraps the blitz4j implementation.

The users can either use configure() or configure(Properties) to kick start the configuration. If the log4j.configuration is provided, the properties are additionally loaded from the provided URL.

The list of appenders to be automatically converted can be provided by the property log4j.logger.asyncAppenders. The configuration takes these appenders and automatically enables them for asynchronous logging.
